newsitem.title: AUSTRALIA: RTRS-Columbus beefs up Australia-West Coast route.
newsitem.headline: RTRS-Columbus beefs up Australia-West Coast route.

text.p: The Columbus Line will introduce a fixed-day weekly shipping service from Australia on the West Coast North America route, Columbus Line Australia Pty Ltd said.

With the addition of a seventh ship, the Columbus Canterbury, to the route, Columbus Line would introduce weekly sailings from Melbourne and Sydney with fixed-day arrivals at destination and a punctual, seven-day spacing between all West Coast sailings, it said in a statement.
Managing director Achim Drescher said the company was responding to client demand to offer increased reliability in services to and from North America.
Columbus Line is owned by German shipping group Hamburg-Sud, which is turn is owned by a privately owned diversified conglomerate, the Oetker Group.
